channel.title: Movember on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Movember on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: Sometimes You Simply Get What You Pay For
item.description: Some time during the Podcasting for CancerÂ fundraiser period I somehow suggested that we should pair it with this years Movember. Despite my wife and daughters strenuous protests, I signed up and went all in. By all in, I mean, all in. For the first time since I went to my then employers christmas party dressed as a woman, I shaved my whole face. My trusty goatee, who had been pretty much constantly with me since 1997, was gone.
